kannada_original: ನೀ ಇದ್ದೆ, ನೀ ಹೋದೆ; ಬದುಕು ಇಷ್ಟೇ ತಾನೆ ?
english_transliteration: Nī idde, nī hōde; baduku iṣṭē tāne ?
english_translation: You were here, you left; isn't life just this?
Who will remember you forever here?

kannada_original: ನಾ ಇಂದ್ರ ನಾ ಚಂದ್ರ ಎನುವ ಭ್ರಮೆ ಬಿಡು ಮೊದಲು;
english_transliteration: Nā Indra nā Chandra enuva bhrame biḍu modalu;
english_translation: First, give up the illusion of saying 'I am Indra, I am Chandra';
Set your feet on the earth – Muddu Rāma.
